headline: Why Caesars Entertainment (CZR) Shares Are Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of hotel and casino entertainment company Caesars Entertainment (NASDAQ:CZR) fell 4.6% in the afternoon session after a broader market downturn sparked by renewed trade and tariff concerns from the White House.
